about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Neelam Linens and Garments (India) Limited is a manufacturer and exporter of high-end soft home fashion around the world. The company offers a wide range of products, including bedsheets, pillow covers, duvet covers, towels, rugs, shirts, and other garments, mainly catering to discount retail outlets.

Neelam Linens and Garments India Limited is engaged in supplying high-thread-count bedding and towel products to discount retail stores and distributors in the USA and Australia.

The Company also engages in trading licenses in the license market. In this process, the Company buys licenses from exporters and then sells them to importers, earning a margin on the price difference.

The company's international clients include Tuesday Morning, TJX, Pem America, Occean State Job Lot, LinCraft Australia, Big Lots, 99 Cents, and U. S. Polo Assign. The company's domestic client includes Vijay Sales, Amazon, Meesho, and Amersons store.

The company operates two manufacturing units located in Mumbai, Maharashtra. As of June 30, 2024, the company had an employee base of 56 employees, out of that fixed employees are 8 and 48 are called on a contract basis.

Competitve Strengths:

  • Purchase of higher quality thread count fabric at a lower price.
  • Experienced promoters and dedicated employee base.

faqs.question: What is the Neelam Linens and Garments IPO?
faqs.answer:
Neelam Linens and Garments IPO is a SME IPO of 5418000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹24 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on November 8, 2024, and closes on November 12, 2024.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Neelam Linens and Garments IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Neelam Linens and Garments IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Neelam Linens and Garments IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Neelam Linens and Garments IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Neelam Linens and Garments IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Neelam Linens and Garments IPO?
faqs.answer: Neelam Linens and Garments IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Neelam Linens and Garments IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Neelam Linens and Garments IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Neelam Linens and Garments IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Neelam Linens and Garments IPO will be done on Wednesday, November 13, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, November 14, 2024. Check the Neelam Linens and Garments IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Neelam Linens and Garments IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Neelam Linens and Garments IPO listing date is on Monday, November 18, 2024.
